title: The Unexpected Knight: an Ace Stone adventure #2
description: This is the second book in the Ace Stone Adventure Series:It’s the early 1990’s, and the dashing yet charming boxing promoter come businessman and financier, Ace Stone, just barely escapes the London scene of crime and murder by his dubious underworld clients, to the promising shores of a new start in America.Exploiting his financial talents with an organized crime family based in New York, Ace works parallel with their business operations in Las Vegas and is elated with his new life in Sin City.But life suddenly starts to spiral out of control as Ace wrongly assumes he is being blamed for an elaborate fraud involving a high-ranking member of the Mob Family and the associated missing haul of millions of dollars in cash, placing Ace in an unrelated trap and spurious hit-list.Ace has to avoid being hunted down, tortured and killed by the hired gun, but only if he can relinquish the loves of his life and trust a cold Assassin whose loyalty is unknown.
author: Nicholas A. Price
